meanings.definition: Relating to or located on the outer layer of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The epidermic layer of the skin protects us from harm.
meanings.sent2: It is important to keep the epidermic layer healthy by moisturizing.
meanings.sent3: The epidermic shield defended the superhero from the villain's attacks.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an epidermic barrier against sadness.
meanings.sent5: The epidermic layer acts as a shield, guarding the body from external threats.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affecting the epidermis.
meanings.sent1: An epidermic condition can cause discomfort and itching.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a cream for the epidermic irritation.
meanings.sent3: The epidermic reaction to the lotion was unexpected but temporary.
meanings.sent4: His epidermic sensitivity made him prone to sunburns.
meanings.sent5: The epidermic changes were visible signs of the skin's response to the treatment.
